channel.title: technology on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in technology on FinanClub

item.title: Software Company New Relic in Talks to Be Sold
item.description: According to a report by the Wall Street Journal, private-equity firms Francisco Partners and TPG are jointly bidding over $5 billion to acquire New Relic, a software company specializing in analytics and observability tools [^1^][^2^][^3^]. The article did not provide any further information about the potential acquisition.

item.title: In Ukraine, Technology Only Thickens the Fog of War
item.description: The conflict in Ukraine has been ongoing for years, with no clear end in sight. As technology advances, it has become increasingly intertwined with the conflict, with both sides utilizing it to gain an advantage. On May 17, 2023, Bloomberg published an article titled “In Ukraine, Technology Only Thickens the Fog of War” by Leonid Bershidsky.
